verses.verse: The whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> assembled themselves <S%H6950>together<s%> at <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> and set <S%H7931>up<s%> the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> <S%H776>there.<s%> The land was <S%H3533>subdued<s%> before <S%H6440>them.<s%>
<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%> <S%H3498>remained<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which had not yet <S%H2505>divided<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "How long will you <S%H7503>neglect<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> in to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> has given <S%H5414>you?<s%>

<S%H3051>Appoint<s%> for yourselves <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> from each <S%H7626>tribe.<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H6965>them,<s%> and they shall arise, <S%H1980>walk<s%> through the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H3789>describe<s%> it <S%H6310>according<s%> to their <S%H5159>inheritance;<s%> and they shall come to <S%H935>me.<s%>

They shall <S%H2505>divide<s%> it into <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2506>portions.<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall <S%H5975>live<s%> in his <S%H1366>borders<s%> on the <S%H5045>south,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> shall <S%H5975>live<s%> in their <S%H1366>borders<s%> on the <S%H6828>north.<s%>

You shall <S%H3789>survey<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> into <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2506>parts,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> the description here to <S%H3384>me;<s%> and I will cast <S%H1486>lots<s%> for you here <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

For the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> have no <S%H2506>portion<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H3550>you;<s%> for the priesthood of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is their <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%> <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H7626>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> have <S%H3947>received<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4217>eastward,<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> gave <S%H5414>them.<s%>"

The <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H3212>went.<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> those who <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H3789>survey<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> through the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3789>survey<s%> <S%H7725>it,<s%> and come again to <S%H7993>me.<s%> I will cast <S%H1486>lots<s%> for you here <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh.<s%>"

The <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and passed <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H3789>surveyed<s%> it by <S%H5892>cities<s%> into <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2506>portions<s%> in a <S%H5612>book.<s%> They <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> at <S%H7887>Shiloh.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> for them in <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> There <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H2505>divided<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> according to their <S%H4256>divisions.<s%>

The <S%H1486>lot<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%> The <S%H1366>border<s%> of their <S%H1486>lot<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> between the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%>

Their <S%H1366>border<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>quarter<s%> was from the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%> The <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> on the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> through the hill <S%H2022>country<s%> <S%H3220>westward.<s%> It <S%H8444>ended<s%> at the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of Beth <S%H1007>Aven.<s%>

The <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> along from there to <S%H3870>Luz,<s%> to the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H3870>Luz<s%> (the same is <S%H1008>Bethel<s%>), <S%H5045>southward.<s%> The <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> to Ataroth <S%H5853>Addar,<s%> by the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> that lies on the <S%H5045>south<s%> of Beth <S%H1032>Horon<s%> the <S%H8481>lower.<s%>

The <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H8388>extended,<s%> and <S%H5437>turned<s%> around on the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>quarter<s%> <S%H5045>southward,<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> that lies <S%H6440>before<s%> Beth <S%H1032>Horon<s%> <S%H5045>southward;<s%> and <S%H8444>ended<s%> at Kiriath <S%H7154>Baal<s%> (the same is Kiriath <S%H7157>Jearim<s%>), a <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> This was the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>quarter.<s%>

The <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>quarter<s%> was from the <S%H7097>farthest<s%> part of Kiriath <S%H7157>Jearim.<s%> The <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H3220>westward,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H4599>spring<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5318>Nephtoah.<s%>

The <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7097>farthest<s%> part of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> that lies <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom,<s%> which is in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%> <S%H6828>northward.<s%> It went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom,<s%> to the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%> <S%H5045>southward,<s%> and went <S%H3381>down<s%> to En <S%H5883>Rogel.<s%>

It <S%H8388>extended<s%> <S%H6828>northward,<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> at En <S%H5885>Shemesh,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H1553>Geliloth,<s%> which is over <S%H5227>against<s%> the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> of <S%H131>Adummim.<s%> It went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H68>stone<s%> of <S%H932>Bohan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben.<s%>
It passed <S%H5674>along<s%> to the <S%H3802>side<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> <S%H6828>northward,<s%> and went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H6160>Arabah.<s%>

The <S%H1366>border<s%> passed <S%H5674>along<s%> to the <S%H3802>side<s%> of Beth <S%H1031>Hoglah<s%> <S%H6828>northward;<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H8444>ended<s%> at the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H3956>bay<s%> of the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> at the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%> This was the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H1366>border.<s%>

The <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> was its <S%H1379>border<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H6285>quarter.<s%> This was the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> by the <S%H1367>borders<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H4940>it,<s%> according to their families.

Now the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%> were <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> Beth <S%H1031>Hoglah,<s%> <S%H6010>Emek<s%> <S%H7104>Keziz,<s%>
Beth <S%H1026>Arabah,<s%> <S%H6787>Zemaraim,<s%> <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%>
<S%H5761>Avvim,<s%> <S%H6511>Parah,<s%> <S%H6084>Ophrah,<s%>
Chephar <S%H3726>Ammoni,<s%> <S%H6078>Ophni,<s%> and <S%H1387>Geba;<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>
<S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%> <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> <S%H881>Beeroth,<s%>
<S%H4708>Mizpeh,<s%> <S%H3716>Chephirah,<s%> <S%H4681>Mozah,<s%>
<S%H7552>Rekem,<s%> <S%H3416>Irpeel,<s%> <S%H8634>Taralah,<s%>

<S%H6762>Zelah,<s%> <S%H507>Eleph,<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%> (the same is <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>), <S%H1394>Gibeath,<s%> and <S%H7157>Kiriath;<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%> This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>
